attributes.action: create and fund more private schools for special needs children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i have 2 children with special needs , but as i am retired on ill health grounds i cannot take my cue from miss kelly and fund my children privately.  will the government set up a special fund for me perhaps out of lottery money so i can have the same privileges for my  2 children?
